title: Shy Guy Squad

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
-Add a Shy Guy into your squad during the night.
-Attack a target during the night.
-Once per game, add a Shy Guy into your squad, and for the night, you may act as if you have 5 Shy Guys in your Squad, even if you have less or more.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-Your power grows with each Shy Guy you add.
-You start with 1 Shy Guy in your squad.
> 1: Basic Attack, No Defense
> 2: Basic Attack, Basic Defense
> 3: Powerful Attack, Basic Defense
> 4: Unstoppable Attack, Powerful Defense
> 5: Unstoppable Attack, Powerful Defense, and you will rampage.
> 6: Unstoppable Attack, Invincible Defense, and you will rampage.

desc:
Post 1773
*The only thing that can deal damage to Luigi in the No Jumping challenge.*
